mapper.select: select somt.Sales_OutMat_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Code, pit.Product_Item_Name Sales_OutMat_Name, somt.Sales_OutMat_Qty, somt.Sales_OutMat_Unit_Price, somt.Sales_OutMat_Price, somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, cut.Cus_Name Sales_OutMat_Client_Name, somt.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc, somt.Sales_OutMat_Date from Sales_OutMat_tbl somt inner join Product_Info_tbl pit on somt.Sales_OutMat_Code = pit.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl cut on somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code = cut.Cus_Code where somt.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No = #{Sales_OutMat_Cus_No} and somt.Sales_OutMat_Code = #{Sales_OutMat_Code} and somt.Sales_OutMat_Date >= curdate() order by somt.Sales_OutMat_No

SELECT A.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No, A.Sales_OutMat_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Code, C.Product_Item_Name Sales_OutMat_Name, B.LM_Qty Sales_OutMat_Qty, A.Sales_OutMat_Unit_Price, A.Sales_OutMat_Price, C.Product_Info_STND_1 Sales_OutMat_STND_1, C.Product_Info_STND_2 Sales_OutMat_STND_2, dt.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Item_Clsfc_Name_2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Material, A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, D.Cus_Name Sales_OutMat_Client_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Date, A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time, A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc, E.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Modifier FROM Sales_OutMat_tbl A inner join LotMaster_tbl B ON A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No = B.LM_LotNo inner join Product_Info_tbl C ON A.Sales_OutMat_Code = C.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl D on A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code = D.Cus_Code inner join DTL_TBL E ON A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = E.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt ON C.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt2 ON C.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt2.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt3 ON C.Product_Material = dt3.Child_TBL_No where B.LM_Qty > 0 AND B.LM_WareHouse = (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 10 and Child_TBL_Type = '제품창고') AND A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc != (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 19 and Child_TBL_Type = '출하반품')
AND A.Sales_OutMat_Date >= #{startDate} and A.Sales_OutMat_Date < #{endDate}
AND A.Sales_OutMat_Code like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
AND A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
group by A.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No

SELECT A.Sales_OutMat_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Lot_No, A.Sales_OutMat_Code, A.Sales_OutMat_Qty sales_OutReturn_Qty, A.Sales_OutMat_Unit_Price, A.Sales_OutMat_Price, B.Product_Item_Name Sales_OutMat_Name, B.Product_Info_STND_1 Sales_OutMat_STND_1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 Sales_OutMat_STND_2, dt.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, dt2.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Item_Clsfc_Name_2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Material, A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, C.Cus_Name Sales_OutMat_Client_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc_Name, A.Sales_OutMat_Date, A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time, A.Sales_OutMat_Modifier FROM Sales_OutMat_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.Sales_OutMat_Code = B.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl C on A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code = C.Cus_Code inner join DTL_TBL D on A.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL dt ON B.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt2 ON B.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt2.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt3 ON B.Product_Material = dt3.Child_TBL_No
where A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time >= #{startDate} and A.Sales_OutMat_dInsert_Time < #{endDate}
and A.Sales_OutMat_Code like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%')
and A.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
and Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = '213'

select somt.Sales_OutMat_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Cus_No, somt.Sales_OutMat_Date, dt.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc_Name, somt.Sales_OutMat_Code, somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code, pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME Sales_OutMat_Name, pit.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 Sales_OutMat_STND_1, pit.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_2 Sales_OutMat_STND_2, dt3.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, dt4.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Item_Clsfc_Name_2, dt5.Child_TBL_Type Sales_OutMat_Material, dt2.CHILD_TBL_TYPE Sales_OutMat_UNIT, sum(somt.Sales_OutMat_Qty) Sales_OutMat_Qty, sum(somt.Sales_OutMat_Price) Sales_OutMat_Price from Sales_OutMat_tbl somt inner join DTL_TBL dt on somt.Sales_OutMat_Send_Clsfc = dt.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join Product_Info_tbl pit on somt.Sales_OutMat_Code = pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL dt2 on pit.PRODUCT_UNIT = dt2.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt3.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt4 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt4.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL dt5 ON pit.Product_Material = dt5.Child_TBL_No
where somt.Sales_OutMat_Date >= #{startDate} and somt.Sales_OutMat_Date < #{endDate}
and somt.Sales_OutMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
group by somt.Sales_OutMat_Code with rollup
